programme.title: Intercept - EP 0001 & 0002
programme.desc: An elderly woman dies under suspicious circumstances. The police discovers the ambulance that picked her up might have been responsible. They get to work tracking down a possible rogue ambulance.

programme.title: Weird Food Diaries - EP 7
programme.desc: In Bali, Rozz uncovers the island's rugged, cultural beauty - and its lesser-known culinary underbelly. Here, Rozz meets and feasts on a creature of the night, takes part in its food festivals and pushes her taste buds to the limit with strange satay and bee salads.

programme.title: 星期二特写: 寻找新边际 Tuesday Report - The New Periphery - EP 2
programme.desc: The Sino-Singapore Jilin Food Zone which is designated as a disease-free zone, has an anchor pig farm project, which would be a source of pork supply for Singapore in the future. programme.title: 谢谢你不离不弃 By Your Side - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Adelyn was born with a rare concentral eye disease called Peter's Anomaly, which means that she had "opaque" corneas. Unfortunately, all four operations were failures, and she can only make out colours, light and shadows. Her father left home and never returned. Her mother Mary Koh, a housewife of 10 years, was forced to find work as a tuition teacher to take care of her three young daughters. (重)母亲林美丽是女儿许心慧的守护者。许心慧患有先天性眼角膜缺陷，几乎全盲。小时候的心慧不像现在这么充满自信，是个非常害羞的女生，妈妈花了很长时间慢慢教导她，让她知道'尝试'很重要。很多东西对我们来说是本能，但对心慧来说，需要无数次的尝试。11岁那年，自制钢琴创作CD筹钱医双眼，接受人工眼角膜移植手术，结果因为排斥无法恢复视力。林美丽以乐观积极的信念，扮演着举足轻重守护者的角色，希望许心慧能够一步步更接近自己的梦想。.

programme.title: 大话精 True Lies - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Aidan is a compulsive liar who doesn't bat an eyelid when it comes to spinning lies. But he didn't always used to be like this. In fact, he never told a lie when he was young but when his late mother was dying, he decided to lie to her. It was his first lie and he's never stopped since. One by one, Aidan's lies become true; a beautiful lady who is a complete stranger passionately kisses him. Aidan complains to De Hua that she stole his first kiss and the two friends get drunk. (PG)(重)赵毅刚（Aidan） 是个爱说谎的家伙，说谎不眨眼。但其实他在小时候根本不会说谎，因为要让过世前的母亲安息，他开始说了他人生的第一个谎话，从此万劫不复。。。 谎话接二连三成真，Aidan更因说谎，被陌生美女强吻了自己；Aidan对德华控诉自己初吻被夺，买醉回家的Aidan发现家中出现怪异现象，怀疑床上藏着人，Aidan战战兢兢上前准备掀开被单。。。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 53
programme.desc: (R) Mingxi accuses Zhi-an of manipulating Daojing so that she can lay her hands on the company one day. Though fearful, Zhi-an retorts and states that she is not in a relationship with Daojing and she is not at all interested to return to the Cui household. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)明熙利用鲜于希引知安现身。随后，明熙指知安心机重，想通过道京得到海成集团所以勾引道京还教唆他离家。知安面对明熙时内心感到非常害怕，但仍然镇定地表明自己与道京没有关系，而且她根本不想回到海成家。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 54
programme.desc: (R) Taixiu's family wants him to go for a body checkup when they sense that something is amiss with him. However, Taixiu is not appreciative of their concern and tell them straight that he is disappointed with how they have treated him ever since his business failed. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)家人们察觉太修的身体或许出状况了，于是围绕着他，要他赶紧去接受身体检查。岂料，太修不稀罕家人们的关心，并第一次说出他生意失败后被家人们忽视的感受，令大家都觉得很惭愧。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 2 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) This food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. (重)美食节目介绍有特色的台湾料理，也同时披露每道菜肴背后的感人故事。.

programme.title: 求学地图 Schools Unlimited - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Hong Kong movies are iconic in the Hong Kong culture. Korean movies are a driving force in Korean culture. Many foreign students are attracted to achieve their movie dreams in Hong Kong and Korea respectively. Yi Fong talks to two Singaporean students studying film courses in Hong Kong and Korea. (重)香港电影是香港文化的一大标记，吸引着怀揣电影梦的国外年轻人来到香港追梦。韩国电影是韩国文化的一大推动力，吸引着各国留学生前去韩国打造电影梦。怡凤前往香港与韩国采访两位修读影视专业课程的新加坡籍留学生。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 49
programme.desc: (R) Xiuqing approaches Xianying to help Yinghao out. Xianying demands Xiuqing to go down on her knees to apologise for the hurt and embarrassment she has caused her and Zaiyong previously. Xiuqing does as told. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀卿见英鎬为公司的事心烦，又从具室长那儿听说仙英似乎不肯帮英鎬，于是特地去找仙英，要求她帮英鎬。仙英要秀卿为她之前带给载永和她的伤害下跪道歉。秀卿照做。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Zhixu decides to quit his job at the law firm and sets up his own legal practice. He tries to persuade head prosecutor Fang to join him as his assistant but Fang hesitates. He also persuades Fengxi to work with him and find the real murderer of Xijun together to clear her name. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)智旭决定辞去律师楼的工作，创立自己的律师事务所。他去检察厅游说方股长加入做他的助理，但方股长有点迟疑。他也去游说奉熙一起工作，一起找出杀害熙俊的真凶，帮她洗脱冤屈。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 55
programme.desc: Zhixiu gets Zhihao to pose as her boyfriend in front of Xianyu He, but their attempt fails almost immediately. Xianyu He tells Zhixiu that though his first love was indeed Zhi-an, he is only in love with Zhixiu at the moment. Zhixiu finally accepts Xianyu He. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)知秀要知浩在鲜于赫面前假装是她的男友，但很快便被鲜于赫识破了。鲜于赫坦言知安确实是他的初恋，但他现在喜欢的是知秀。听到鲜于赫的一番话后，知秀终于放下芥蒂，正式跟鲜于赫在一起。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 56
programme.desc: The doctor informs Taixiu's family that Taixiu does not have cancer. Instead, his body is displaying symptoms of cancer due to long-time stress and depression. Zhi-an feels guilty for making Taixiu worried when she left home previously. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)医生说太修其实没有患癌，而是因为长期焦虑，所以患上想象癌。知安发现太修为了她和家人们长期承受了很大的压力，对自己之前离家的举动感到惭愧不已。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 5
programme.desc: From creatively-styled dishes to simple delights found in Taiwan, Host Danny Yeo explores delectable food inspired by the works of four notable Taiwanese authors. 从气派十足的创意料理到朴实恬淡的家常小菜，这一趟台湾之旅，主持人杨君伟透过四位作家的笔触，探索台湾的暖心美食，品尝透过味蕾触发内心情感的飨宴。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 2
programme.desc: Shanmei bleeds from a wound when she is attacked by the puppet ghost. Her blood attracts the attention of evil spirits. Wukong rushes to rescue Shanmei and realises that she is the new Tripitaka. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)善美被木偶鬼攻击时刮伤手臂，从她伤口流出的血的气息吸引众多厉鬼飞奔去纠缠她。悟空前去保护善美时发现她就是三藏。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) From creatively-styled dishes to simple delights found in Taiwan, Host Danny Yeo explores delectable food inspired by the works of four notable Taiwanese authors. (重)从气派十足的创意料理到朴实恬淡的家常小菜，这一趟台湾之旅，主持人杨君伟透过四位作家的笔触，探索台湾的暖心美食，品尝透过味蕾触发内心情感的飨宴。.

programme.title: 烧。卖 Served H.O.T. - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) The trio finally forced Fugui to cook and he whipped up a plate of fried rice. After eating it, the trio wanted him to teach them but he refused. He stated his terms: they had to cook up a plate of fried rice of certain standard or there would be no room for negotiation. (PG)(重)三个年轻人即将得到老字号南洋风味小吃店价值一百万的Laksa祖传秘方。他们是风雨同舟的兄弟：商业奇才庄浩伦（包勋评饰）、刀神陈欧文（方伟杰饰）和烹饪天才何泰龙（冯伟衷饰），合称“H.O.T”。三个前科犯准备接管生意，创造更好的生活。他们将遇到为厨师梦而孤军奋战的曾美薇（雅慧饰）、扬言破坏他们声誉的大厨Gordon（George Young饰）和破坏弟弟泰龙幸福的泰虎（李腾饰）。H.O.T之间的忠诚和成功将会因为过去的阴影而再次接受挑战。.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Prato, a wholesale centre and manufacturer of women's clothing and also a city with the largest Chinese population in Europe. Local Chinese depends on Prato to survive and Prato tap on their diligence to prosper. To the younger generation, do they consider Prato or the never known China their home? (重)普拉托是欧洲女装加工和批发中心，也是华人最集中的城市。当地华人靠普拉托生存和拓展；普拉托却借助华人的勤奋重整旗鼓，强化往日欧洲服装强国的地位。对年轻一代来说，这里是归宿，还是素未谋面的中国，才是家园？.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 50
programme.desc: (R) Xiuzhe brings Yingxin home and announces that he wants to marry Yingxin as she is pregnant with his child. Xianying tells Shuzi that Zhenshu has deliberately sent Yingxin to seduce Xiuzhe so as to exact revenge on Shuzi. Shuzi thus tells Zhenshu that she will not accept Yingxin into her family. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀哲带英心回家，告诉长辈们英心怀了他的孩子，因此他们要结婚。仙英加油添醋，说真淑为了向淑子报仇，故意让离过婚的女儿勾引秀哲。淑子拿一大笔钱给真淑，说不会接受英心，但要英心生下孩子后，把孩子送到朴家。.

programme.title: 奇怪的搭档 Love In Trouble - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Chef Yang of a cooking show has been murdered and the news spread fast. A suspect has been arrested and he becomes the first to be defended by Zhixu's law firm. Youjing runs into Fengxi and Zhixu again. He asks them whether they are dating... (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)美食节目主厨杨某被杀的事人尽皆知，有一个嫌疑人被抓，并成为了智旭新律师事务所的第一个辩护对象。宥静再一次遇见奉熙和智旭，询问他们是否在拍拖。。。。。。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 57
programme.desc: Daojing goes to the seaweed factory to talk to the boss and is shocked to hear that Zhi-an had attempted to take her own life previously. Daojing finally understands that Zhi-an has suffered a lot because of her love for him. He decides not to pressurize Zhi-an to accept him anymore. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)道京到海苔工厂向老板询问知安之前发生了什么事，发现知安曾经自杀。道京终于明白知安虽然很爱他，但因为他的背景显赫，所以知安不敢高攀，因此一直过得很痛苦。道京决定不再强迫知安接受他。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 58
programme.desc: Mingxi wants Zhixiu to break up with Xianyu He or she will destroy the businesses belonging to Xianyu He, Xianyu Xi and Nanjiu. In addition, she will also make sure that the Xus will no longer have a roof over their heads. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)明熙查到知秀在跟鲜于赫交往。明熙对鲜于赫的背景非常不满意，命令知秀跟鲜于赫分手，否则会使计让鲜于赫的网络商店、鲜于希的咖啡店及南九的面包店都结业，也会让知秀珍惜的家人都流落街头。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 7
programme.desc: The Orang Asli - recognised as the first people of Peninsula Malaysia. It's a diverse collection of tribes and most, with government assistance, now live in riverine villages in Taman Negara. But there are some who still follow the old hunter-gatherer ways. But such a way of life - idyllic as it may seem, does not mean they have it easy. Host Paul Foster journeys up the Tembeling River and into the primeval forest in search of just such a community from the Batek tribe. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 7
programme.desc: In this episode, Bjorn goes a-visiting to two local SMEs - Jumain Sataysfaction and Bee Cheng Hiang that are packaging and exporting their food to consumers abroad. Bjorn also reunites with two previous profiles and checks in on their export progress since they last met. 在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 花遊記 A Korean Odyssey - EP 3
programme.desc: Wukong tries to persuade Shanmei to allow him to eat her rather than to be devoured by other evil spirits. Believing that Wukong is up to no good, Shanmei gives him the golden bracelet as instructed by the Demon King. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)悟空告诉善美，与其让别的厉鬼纠缠她，倒不如让他把她给吃了。善美为了保护自己，听信魔王的话，把金刚箍送给悟空。.

programme.title: 买卖 Business As Usual - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) In China, there are businessmen who can turn a panda's faeces, cockroaches, maggots and insects into highly valuable items. These astute businessmen can suss out a profit opportunity in things that are normally deemed repulsive. (重)如果你能将原本无价值的东西，转换成可挣钱的商品。那你绝对是这宗买卖的赢家！ 在中国有商人将熊猫的粪便，蟑螂、蝇蛆和害虫经加工后，成为高经济价值的商品。原来在商家的眼里只有利益，恶心与否根本不重要！.

programme.title: 探索食材 The Food Detectives 3 - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) The new season of "The Food Detectives" continues the culinary exploration of the foods we eat and more. Host Nikki Muller, will debunk the myths, delve into the unknowns and provide useful information to help us make informed choices for the meals we enjoy and how they fit into our lifestyles. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 寂寞鱼•听见 A Lonely Fish - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Jing Xuan begins to hear strange sounds after she put on the necklace from her parents. Kora believes Jing Xuan is not used to staying alone at home, that's why Jing Xuan is hearing sounds. Jing Xuan introduce Yi Kai to Kora and Kora has a good impression of him. Jing Xuan hears a woman crying in the hospital toilet but Kora said she cannot hear anything. This terrifies Jing Xuan. Jing Xuan goes back school to study and realizes that she no longer felt put off by the noises in class. She also tries to change her attitude and get along with her groupmates. Yi Kai asks Jing Xuan out for dinner and gives some tips about how to handle her emotions. Jing Xuan asks Yi Kai if he could remember their first encounter at the cafe. Yi Kai said he cannot remember with a smile. Yi Kai brings Jing Xuan to the arcade and they have fun together playing games. programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) The Orang Asli - recognised as the first people of Peninsula Malaysia. But such a way of life - idyllic as it may seem, does not mean they have it easy. Host Paul Foster journeys up the Tembeling River and into the primeval forest in search of just such a community from the Batek tribe. (重)六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: The Kingdom: How Fungi Made the World
programme.desc: Neither plant nor animal, fungi has form their own biological kingdom. They've have been around for a billion years and kick-started evolution on land. By looking at fungi in the context of an epic evolutionary story, scientists are making discoveries that will change our lives. Some fungi will save us, others will threaten us and we are just beginning to understand which is which. This is natural history that matters.
